clients.title: Phone Stuffing is Not Allowed on Google Posts
description: The Google Posts content policy for Google My Business (GMB) now officially prohibits “phone stuffing” (the practice of including phone numbers in your GMB posts). While many marketers were already aware that Google frequently rejects posts that include phone numbers, this policy change clarifies the official guidance. Don’t worry – you can still put your number on your profile and include a “Call now” button with your post.

Justia Amplify, also known as Justia PPC Management, umbrellas a number of different advertising channels known to increase conversions. From Google’s Local Services Ads (LSAs), Google Ads, Bing Ads (PPC), and Facebook Remarketing, our marketing professionals will devise strategies that align with the overall goals and characteristics of your law firm.
